cause.description:
- we are the production team "kåken film"
- we want to make a documentary about how the real pirates lived. we are going to shoot the movie at Grindøya (a small island near by Tromsø)
we need help with the budget... !!!
-editing costs a lot of money
-we need many props for the movie
1. we know that you want to support a pirate-documentary!!
2. the world need a pirate-documentary!!
cause.name: Support a PIRATE-movie-production
